messages.msgSnippet: Hey! Do those books belong to you? Cuz I ll buy em off you when you re done with them! I am having a very difficult time trying to get his books through the
messages.messageBody:
Hey! Do those books belong to you? Cuz I'll buy 'em off you when you're
done with them! I am having a very difficult time trying to get his books
through the library. All copies are ALWAYS checked out. I have my name on
the list for one, and I hope to get it in a few days. I checked Amazon.com,
but some are on backorder and might be shipped in 3-5 weeks. Some aren't
even being printed anymore! I was hoping I wouldn't have to buy them new.

If anyone has any of his books and would be willing to lend them to me, I
will pay for shipping to/from, and I will treat them as if my life depended
on it!

Anyone? (sniff, sniff)<<<<

Robin,

I would wholeheartedly recommend buying at least one of Holt's books to have for those times when you fall into the "questioning" days. It always helps to have some encouragement at home when you are doubting yourself.

For the books, go to the GWS site, www.holtgws.com, they have his books on hand, so you shouldn't have to wait.

Good luck!

Karen Mowery
-----------
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
- Henry David Thoreau
